trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that has been applied by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> action.
trans-unit.target: Modifica un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> che è stato applicato mediante un'azione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Sospendere, riprendere, arrestare o controllare in modo interattivo uno Storyboard

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà di relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) di controllo da riferimento relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'inizio.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) per ulteriori informazioni.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> that began the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> che ha avviato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> che si desidera controllare in modo interattivo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> that began the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name" /> di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> che ha avviato l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> che si desidera controllare in modo interattivo.
